title: Heaven of time!
desc: Knowledge is the antidote to fear.

title: Heaven of sky!
desc: While there is life,there is hope..

title: Heaven of cloud!
desc: Dream is what makes you happy, even when you are just trying..

title: Heaven of rain!
desc: When you feel like giving up, remember why you held on so long in the first place.

title: Heaven of you!
desc: Give every day the chance to become the most beautiful day of your life.

title: Heaven of him!
desc: Whatever your past has been, you have a spotless future.

title: Heaven of me!
desc: No matter how bad your heart has been broken, the world doesn’t stop for your grief. The sun comes right back up the next day.

title: Heaven of her!
desc: Do one thing at a time, and do well.

title: Heaven of cat!
desc: No person deserves your tears, and who deserves them won't make you cry.

title: Heaven of dog!
desc: You'll be amazed at how high you can fly when you leave some of the baggage behind!

title: Heaven of rabbit!
desc: Apart from tears, only time could wear everything away. While feeling is being processed by time, conflicts would be reconciled as time goes by.

title: Heaven of apple!
desc: If you must say yes, say it with an open heart. If you must say no, say it without fear.

title: Heaven of pitch!
desc: It is because you care for him so much that makes him outstanding. But if you don't, he is just nothing.

title: Heaven of orange!
desc: You make millions of decisions that mean nothing and then one day your order takes out and it changes your life.

title: Heaven of fish!
desc: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new.

title: Heaven of god!
desc: I can accept failure,but I can't accept not trying.
